name: iniciatec-todo_list-github.io
description: This is a Todo list project using pug ,sass, typescript and firebase.

scripts.watch: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'nodemon --watch src/scss --ext scss --exec "npx sass src/scss/index.scss:dist/css/app.css"' 'nodemon --watch src/js --ext js --exec "npx webpack --config webpack.config.js"'

author: Vallejos Jose Luis
